About Me

I’m currently a 3rd year Ph.D. candidate at City University of Hong Kong advised by Dr. Jia Pan. I recevied an M.Sc from Zhejiang University, advised by Dr. Chao Xu. My work lies in the intersection between computer graphics and robotics, with a focus on 3D reconstruciton of dynamic scenes.

Email: tao.han @my.cityu.edu.hk
